summary: FRONT AUTOMATIC DOOR LOCKS/SWITCHES SPONTANEOUSLY AND INTERMITTENTLY STOPPED FUNCTIONING, AND CREATED INABILITY TO EVEN MANUALLY UNLOCK OR OPEN DRIVER AND PASSENGER DOORS, TRAPPING DRIVER AND/OR PASSENGER IN CAR (INCLUDING MECHANIC WHO TEST-DROVE CAR TO DETERMINE SOURCE OF PROBLEM) ELECTRONIC POWER SOURCE TO LOCKS ULTIMATELY HAD TO BE DISCONNECTED FOR SAFETY.*JB
